message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500.  I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high.  Could you do $12,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
